pkgmetadata.longdescription: =========================Core Oaipmh Harvester App=========================OAI-PMH harvesting capabilities for the curator core project.Quickstart==========1. Add "core_oaipmh_harvester_app" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting-----------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'core_oaipmh_harvester_app', ]2. Include the core_oaipmh_harvester_app URLconf in your project urls.py------------------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python url(r'^oai_pmh/', include('core_oaipmh_harvester_app.urls')),
